overview: Young Lena Rivers, who was born out of wedlock, goes to live with a rich uncle. Unfortunately, her uncle's wife and daughter make no secret of their dislike of Lena and that they don't want her in their family.
tagline: FLYING HOOFS...ROARING CROWDS! FORTUNES AT STAKE...A THRILLING DRAMA OF THE THUNDERING TURF!
title: Lena Rivers
